description.en:
ENTONE  is an Cryptocurrency.

ENTONE was created with the investment of Altingunleri in Turkey for advertising purposes and ease of payment
Altingunleri is active in the field of advertising services, including advertising through Instagram, Google, Facebook and YouTube.
ENTONE has an online advertising platform and a wireless advertising network.
On the ENTONE advertising platform, known as ENTONE, users are rewarded by watching ads, entertainment, Instagram followers and subscribing to YouTube pages. The bonus is paid through ENTONE and is currently traded in  BILAXY .
By purchasing ENTONE wireless devices, you can help develop the Wireless ENTONE network and receive rewards for keeping your wireless devices running and active.
This way you can access ENTONE advertising platform
